metadata.description: Size of the Session Host VM to deploy.  This should correspond to the wvd_maxSessionLimit parameter to align to the 1 user session per CPU core model.
[DO NOT CHANGE] Azure VM Image Offer without the built-in Office product.
[DO NOT CHANGE] Azure VM Image Publisher for multi-session Windows 10.
[DO NOT CHANGE] Azure VM Image SKU for Windows 10 1909.
[DO NOT CHANGE] Azure VM OS Disk Type.
Update this value to reflect the VA region prefix for cloud resources.
Update this value to reflect the VA region prefix for domain joined computers.
Update this value to reflect the Virtual Network name based on the deployment region.
Update this value to reflect the subnet naming prefix in the deployment region. This value is used in a 'copy' loop and the names are derived from the 'copy count'.
Update this value to reflect the location of the 'vn_virtualNetworkName' parameter
Update this value to reflect the resource id of the KeyVault where the secrets are store for the deployment region.
Update this value to reflect the Resource Group where the 'wvd_workspaceName' parameter was created.
Update this value to reflect the Resource Group naming prefix based on the deployment region.  This value is used in a 'copy' loop and the names are derived from the 'copy count'.
Update this value to reflect the maximum session limit per Session Host. Should be based on 1 user session per CPU core of the VM size.
Update this value to reflect how the user session are distributed across the Host Pool. BreadthFirst = Spread OUT across Session Hosts | DepthFirst = Spread DOWN into each Session Host.

wvd_customRdpProperty.value: audiomode:i:0;audiocapturemode:i:1;encode redirected video capture:i:1;redirected video capture encoding quality:i:1;camerastoredirect:s:*;drivestoredirect:s:;redirectclipboard:i:0;redirectprinters:i:0;use multimon:i:0;singlemoninwindowedmode:i:1;maximizetocurrentdisplays:i:1;screen mode id:i:2;smart sizing:i:0;dynamic resolution:i:1;authentication level:i:0;gatewaycredentialssource:i:0;Kdcproxyname:s:kproxy.federation.va.gov

metadata.description: Update this value to reflect the RDP settings that ultimately get pushed to the Windows Desktop client application and determine the default connection parameters for WVD.
Update this value to reflect the API version for the WVD resource objects.
update this value to reflect the starting number of the Host Pool to deploy. This number should correspond to the 'wvd_hostPoolResourceGroupPrefix' parameter as these are precreated in each region.
Update this value to reflect the number of Host Pools to create, the type Host Pool it will serve and the location of the FSLogix profiles.
[DO NOT CHANGE] Domain name to join for the Session Hosts.
